icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Instead of using a custom image, you can click on the pencil to pick an icon from the icon library.

link_text.label: Link Text
link_text.description: Enter the text for the link. There is no actual link on the flip card front, it will only be used for styling purposes.

icon_back.label: Icon Back

3d_effect.label: 3D Effect
3d_effect.description: Enable a 3D Effect for the flip animation.

panel_style.label: Style
panel_style.description: Select one of the boxed card styles or a blank panel.

panel_content_padding.label: Padding
panel_content_padding.description: Add padding to the content if the image is top, bottom, left or right aligned.

panel_size.label: Padding
panel_size.description: Define the card's size by selecting the padding between the card and its content.

panel_card_image.description: Top, bottom, left or right aligned images can be attached to the card's edge. If the image is aligned to the left or right, it will also extend to cover the whole space.

title_style.label: Style
title_style.description: Title styles differ in font-size but may also come with a predefined color, size and font.

title_decoration.label: Decoration
title_decoration.description: Decorate the title with a divider, bullet or a line that is vertically centered to the heading.

title_color.label: Color
title_color.description: Select the text color. If the Background option is selected, styles that don't apply a background image use the primary color instead.

title_element.label: HTML Element
title_element.description: Choose one of the HTML elements to fit the semantic structure.

title_align.label: Alignment
title_align.description: Align the title to the top or left in regards to the content.

title_grid_width.label: Grid Width
title_grid_width.description: Define the width of the title within the grid. Choose between percent and fixed widths or expand columns to the width of their content.

title_grid_column_gap.label: Grid Column Gap
title_grid_column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the title and the content.

title_grid_row_gap.label: Grid Row Gap
title_grid_row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap if the grid items stack.

title_grid_breakpoint.label: Grid Breakpoint
title_grid_breakpoint.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid items will stack.

title_margin.label: Margin Top
title_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

meta_style.label: Style

content_style.label: Style

content_dropcap.label: Drop Cap
content_dropcap.description: Display the first letter of the paragraph as a large initial.

content_column.label: Columns
content_column.description: Set the number of text columns.

content_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.
